data.title: José Aron-Díaz
data.meta_description: José is the Director of Information Technology for the Bezos Earth Fund. In his role, he is establishing all aspects of IT operations, including system…
data.text:
José is the Director of Information Technology for the Bezos Earth Fund. In his role, he is establishing all aspects of IT operations, including system planning, implementation, training, and continuous quality improvement. Before joining the Earth Fund, José spent 10 years at The Rockefeller Foundation, most recently serving as their Director of IT - Solution Delivery. He oversaw all of Rockefeller’s core business applications and incorporated industry best practices in product, project, and Agile management. Earlier, José worked in the private sector, focused on enterprise software implementation and project management.

‍José holds an M.S. in Environmental Policy and Sustainability Management from The New School and a B.S. in Information Systems from Marist College.
